subject: Baseball
Cameras
lead_paragraph: Viewers received a novel view of Game 4 of the A.L.C.S. Tuesday night when a fragment of Brett Gardner’s bat shattered a camera lens on the first base line.
snippet: Viewers received a novel view of Game 4 of the A.L.C.S. Tuesday night when a fragment of Brett Gardner’s bat shattered a camera lens on the first base line.
